resources.string: In this application you will be given a short introduction to the ten albums of Taylor Swift. Surprise!

Taylor Swift has gained commercial success with her 10 studio albums and 4 re-recordings, this application will only be on the ten regular albums. In order of release these are: Debut, Fearless, Speak Now, Red, 1989, Reputation, Lover, folklore, evermore and Midnights. My personal favourites are Reputation and folklore, try to switch between Reputation mode and folklore mode up in the left corner! :)
Login Credentials: your album of choice. Password: 12345
Thank you for using my application :)
